title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Crossing the hills withhis retinue, by a thoroughfare known sometimes asthe King's, sometimes the Thief's Road, becausetraversed by both, Cockburn is said to have beenpounced on unexpectedly while sitting at dinner, andhanged on the gate.
